concept.title: Introduction to DitaCraft
concept.shortdesc: DitaCraft is a comprehensive Visual Studio Code extension for editing and publishing DITA content.

section.title: What is DitaCraft?
section.p: DitaCraft is the easiest way to edit and publish your DITA (Darwin Information Typing Architecture) files directly from Visual Studio Code. It provides a complete authoring environment with:

ul.li: Key space resolution for keyref and conkeyref
Live HTML5 preview with scroll sync

section.title: Key Features
section.p: DitaCraft offers the following key features:

dlentry.dd: Ctrl+Click on href, conref, keyref, and conkeyref attributes to navigate directly to referenced content.
Real-time validation against DITA 1.3 DTDs using TypesXML with 100% W3C conformance.
Side-by-side HTML5 preview with bidirectional scroll sync, theme support, and print mode.
Publish to HTML5, PDF, EPUB, and more with direct DITA Open Toolkit integration.
Interactive tree view showing your DITA map hierarchy with navigation support.

section.title: Supported File Types
section.p: DitaCraft supports the following DITA file types:

strow.stentry: Book-oriented maps with chapters and parts
